title: 14 Day Ban and Honor Reset for Inting, But My Whole 5 Queue Did It...
body: So i queued up for a match with 4 of my buddies, and right as we get in the game our 6th friend gets in the call and says we should 3v3. My whole team then tries to get the game to end faster than waiting for the 15 minute ff because we didn't have much time to get the custom game on the road. All 5 of us were running it down all game, and i don't know if anyone even on the enemy team reported me because we were having dance parties, and fountain races, etc. For some reason out of all 4 of my friends (all doing the same thing i was, some with even more deaths in enemy fountain than me) didn't receive any penalty, but i get a 14 day ban which also comes with an honor reset. This sucks because now anything bad i ever do will get me perm banned if i have read other stories correctly. Is there anything that can be done about this. Here's the match link that shows up in the message (the only game that shows up keep in mind) https://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2989842600/71671874?tab=overview

replies.body: thats a fair ban. you trolled other players. not only your team was effected. someone reported you for this ban. so it hurt him. there for its a justified ban.
Thanks to all of you who helped me through this. I've just been unbanned after a review of my case. Good luck on the rift!

Intentionally feeding in order to lose and assist the enemy team is definitely punishable. Since it's not chat-related, it skips the chat restrictions and goes right to a 14-day suspension. It doesn't matter that your whole team did it; it's still against the rules.
but what i don't seem to understand then is why only i was issued the 14 day and none of my friends were
